Name: UCSB
Description: One of the top ten public universities in the country, UC Santa Barbara is world renowned for academic performance and its beautiful campus. Located in Goleta, California, UC Santa Barbara is right on the coast, allowing students to surf and go to the beach all the time!

Name: Coronado
Description: Coronado, California is a small town located on a peninsula in the San Diego Bay. The Hotel Del Coronado is a historic landmark, and Coronado beach has been voted in the top ten beaches in the USA.

Name: Portland
Description: Portland, Oregon is a beautiful city, with clean downtown streets and a popular shopping district. On the outskirts of town, there is amazing hiking, through the snow-capped mountains along the Columbia River.

Name: Las Gaviotas
Description: One of the safest places to vacation in Mexico, Las Gaviotas is right on the ocean, with amazing surfing and swimming. There is also beach volleyball courts and a jacuzzi.

Name: Mendocino
Description: A Northern California city famous for its amazing Redwood trees and beautiful coastline, largely untouched by man. Mendocino has some of the worlds best mountain biking trails.

Name: Big Bear
Description: One of Southern California's best recreational destinations, Big Bear is full of fun activities such as snowboarding, skiing, mountain biking, as well as lake activities in the summer time.
